sentences.sContent: Hilary bought her wedding dress off-the-peg at a department store.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hilary bought her wedding dress off-the-peg at a department store.
sentences.sCn: 希拉里在百货公司买了现成的新娘礼服。

trans.tranOther: off-the-peg clothes are made in standard sizes, not made especially to fit one person
